mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, password, name, gender, birth_date, food_category_id, phone, address, created_at FROM user_tb
SELECT user_id, email, password, name, gender, birth_date, food_category_id, phone, address, created_at FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tb (email, password, name, gender, birth_date, food_category_id, phone, address) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{foodCategoryId}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_tb SET email = #{email}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, food_category_id = #{foodCategoryId}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
